H0.text: Name the singer who, along with Vince Clarke, made up the pop group Yazoo. David Bowie

H1.text: Name the singer who, along with Vince Clarke, made up the pop group Yazoo. Simon Le Bon

H2.text: Name the singer who, along with Vince Clarke, made up the pop group Yazoo. Marc Almond

H3.text: Name the singer who, along with Vince Clarke, made up the pop group Yazoo. Alf Moyet

A4.text: Alison Moyet (vocals) and former Depeche Mode member Vince Clarke (keyboards) formed Yazoo in late 1981
